General.Name: CK Power Public Company Limited
General.GicIndustry: Independent Power and Renewable Electricity Producers
General.Description: CK Power Public Company Limited, through its subsidiaries, generates and sells electricity and steam in Thailand. The company operates through three segments: Generation of Electricity from Hydroelectric Power, Generation of Electricity from Solar Power, and Generation of Electricity from Thermal Power. It also operates 2 hydro power plants with a capacity of 1,900 MW; 9 solar power plant with a capacity of 29 MW; and 2 cogeneration power plants with installed capacity of 238 MW. In addition, the company provides consulting and other services related to electricity generating projects. CK Power Public Company Limited was incorporated in 2011 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.
